definition: to juggle with words (dishonestly)/to be a hypocrite and hide behind florid rhetoric
to play/to have fun/to trifle with/toy/sth used for amusement/curio or antique (Taiwan pr. [wan4])/to keep sth for entertainment
to do/to manage/to handle/to play with/to fool with/to mess with/to fix/to toy with
word/statement/speech/lyrics/CL:組|组[zu3],個|个[ge4]/a form of lyric poetry, flourishing in the Song dynasty 宋朝|宋朝[Song4 chao2]/CL:首[shou3]
